questionNl: Vertel wat deze persoon doet. Gebruik de woorden: eerst, daarna, tenslotte.
questionEn: Tell what this person does. Use the words: first, then, finally.

selfAssessmentCriteria.text: I used sequencing words (Eerst, Daarna, Tenslotte)
selfAssessmentCriteria.textEn: I used sequencing words (Eerst, Daarna, Tenslotte)

modelAnswer.transcript: First the person wakes up. Then the person eats breakfast. Finally the person leaves the house.
modelAnswer.transcriptNl: Eerst wordt de persoon wakker. Daarna eet de persoon ontbijt. Tenslotte gaat de persoon het huis uit.

tips: Use sequencing words: Eerst (First), Daarna (Then), Tenslotte (Finally).
Describe each picture with one simple sentence.
Speak slowly and clearly - you do not need long sentences.
